welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Illzach, where the enchanting charm of Alsace awaits you! Known for its picturesque scenery and rich culture, we invite you to immerse yourself in our beautiful city and uncover all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Euroairport Swiss Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Colmar-houssen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The dedicated terminal for handling cargo shipments at Colmar-houssen Airport.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
